title: Robot takes a ride
desc: Take a ride around the park with your friendly robot. Robots love recreation!

title: Who wouldn't fall for this little guy?
desc: After a long hard day of walking through sand, this android just gets pooped!

title: Android companions are a big help at human's mealtime
desc: Your animatronic buddies love to human owners with a delicious power source!

title: Don't like working out alone? Go for a jog!
desc: Cyborgs never need water or have heart-attacks!

title: For robots, violence is an art!
desc: Post-modern performanc art or Tactical Urban Assaault... They're great at both!

title: Robots love mistreatment & abuse.
desc: If you're angry, take it out on your robot. He will never hold a grudge or retaliate, ever!

title: Santa's little cyborg helpers!
desc: Santa cuts down on labor costs with these adorable android deer!

title: Awww!
desc: Robots get along with and will never harm your pets.

title: Part of a nutritious breakfast!
desc: Start your day out together with new darling droid.

title: Knife-skills...
desc: Some cyborgs are known to be agressive but would never stab humans.

title: Cyborg having a bad day.
desc: Robots' favorite task is hard menial labor. But, everyone has a bad day.

title: Daily exercise keeps him fit!
desc: Your robot just can't get enough of the treadmill!

title: Cyborgs can't help showing off
desc: Take lessons with your new friend in Yoga, Karate or Pilates!
